page.title: 15COMPUTER NESSCLIFFE SCHOOL
page.content: We have got a computer in school. We take it in turns with each class to have the computer. We have got a VDU, discdrive and tape recorder, tapes and discs. When I first had a go on the computer we did not have a turtle chip in our BBC computer, we have now. The turtle chip lets you draw things. Last week we had 5 star awards and the computer helped with it. It sorts the names into order and then you put your scores in. It's clever the way it sorts the scores out. My favourite games area Timtrek, which you are the starship Enterprise trying to kill enemy ships, and Frogdog, where you are this frog which a dog is after. Teashop is one of the best games we have got - you buy cups of tea and sell them for more money. Having a computer is fun.
